verses.text: \w But|strong="G1161"\w* let \w your|strong="G3588"\w* words be \w in|strong="G2980"\w* agreement \w with|strong="G2980"\w* true \w and|strong="G1161"\w* right \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w*:

\w That|strong="G1722"\w* old \w women|strong="G4247"\w* \w are|strong="G4183"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w be|strong="G3366"\w* self-respecting \w in|strong="G1722"\w* behaviour, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* saying evil \w of|strong="G1722"\w* others, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* given \w to|strong="G1722"\w* taking \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, teachers \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* which \w is|strong="G3631"\w* \w good|strong="G2567"\w*,

\w To|strong="G3870"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w young|strong="G3501"\w* men give orders \w to|strong="G3870"\w* be wise \w and|strong="G3870"\w* serious-minded:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* see \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* an example \w of|strong="G2041"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*; holy \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G3956"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w*, serious \w in|strong="G1722"\w* behaviour,

\w Servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w under|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* authority \w of|strong="G1401"\w* \w their|strong="G3956"\w* \w masters|strong="G1203"\w*, \w pleasing|strong="G2101"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w without|strong="G3361"\w* argument;

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* come, giving \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w* \w to|strong="G0444"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*,

\w Looking|strong="G4327"\w* \w for|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* glad \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* revelation \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Saviour \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G2511"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w* \w free|strong="G3084"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* wrongdoing, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G2511"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G1325"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w clean|strong="G2511"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* heart \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G0575"\w* fire \w with|strong="G0575"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w On|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* points give \w teaching|strong="G2980"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* help, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* make clear \w what|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* right \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w authority|strong="G2003"\w*. \w Let|strong="G4065"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* give \w you|strong="G4771"\w* honour.
